Description: Schecter C-1 SPECIAL Atomic Orange Used. A dealer exclusive at a price that can't be beat.The Schecter C-1 SPECIAL is an amazing deal. It brings an extensive list of features within reach of almost any budget. The mahogany body is beautifully sculpted and available in some eye-catching finishes that belie this guitar's price point. The bolt-on maple neck is designed for speed and playing ease with a comfortable fretboard radius and 24 extra-jumbo frets. Powerful Duncan Designed pickups are wired to a master volume and a push/pull tone control for coil-tapping and rapid tone-tweaking. A string-thru-body bridge system adds sustain while making intonation adjustments a snap.
